rmi.server

Interface IServerController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RmiServerController, ServerGameController

    public interface IServerController
extends java.rmi.Remote
    this is the interface that the battleships server exposes to the clients
    Author:
    rverbist

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        void connect(java.lang.String host,
           int port,
           java.lang.String resource,
           java.lang.String name)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        connect to the server as a player with the given name
        Parameters:
        host - the host name of the client
        port - the port of the client
        resource - the java rmi resource name of the client
        name - the name of the player
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an java rmi related exception occurs

                throws java.rmi.RemoteException

        Parameters:
        player - the player to disconnect
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an java rmi related exception occurs
